issue.title: Change default fix version in merge tool to be the next mainline release version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2220](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2220). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now, the default fix version is coming up as "JS-0.4.0". It would be nice if this could be changed to be 0.9.0 since we have multiple release lines

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2220?focusedCommentId=16570710) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Getting a bit tired of this. Taking a look

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2220?focusedCommentId=16570917) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2382
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2382>
